attributes.action: keep British summer time all year round
attributes.additional_details:
Simply for the many benefits that it will bring to all in Britain 
safety on the roads etc during late afternoon periods in winter months
Provide new opportunities to do more things with family & friends due to the benefit of the extra daylight particular during winter 
100% help improve the lives of millions like those dealing with mental health issues & many others too that would benefit so much with the extra hours of daylight
attributes.background: Debate the benefits that outweigh any drawbacks & legislate to permanently keep British summer time all year round
